channel.title: $5 for someone to help with various problems with my server
channel.description: All in the title pretty much, although i won't accept people who don't have some sort of an application. So please leave a brief app e.g. I coded/code a successful server and am willing to help you with your issues. :D (post count will probably help :))

item.title: $5 for someone to help with various problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You are not allowed to offer payment for services, so please take down the offer. I’m sure that there is somebody who would do it for free.

Read full topic

item.title: $5 for someone to help with various problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

I might be able to help, but it depends what kind of server you have. I’m only really into 317s (specifically Delta or PI based sources) therefore if it is any of these I may be able to help, PM your email and/or client link
